remarks: Evaluate a group sum in a polynomial ring over a subring.  (Contributed by AV, 22-Sep-2019.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 31-Jan-2020.)
statement:
subrgply1.s $e |- S = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
subrgply1.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
subrgply1.u $e |- U = ( Poly1 ` H ) $.
subrgply1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` U ) $.
gsumply1subr.s $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) $.
gsumply1subr.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumply1subr.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumply1subr $p |- ( ph -> ( S gsum F ) = ( U gsum F ) ) $.
